Key Match Events: The Mavericks ended the game with a strong 16-point lead in the third quarter and a late 1-0 run to rally
The reserves outscored the Lakers' bench 50-25, including contributions from Grimes and Hardy
Pre-Game Insights: The Mavericks were without their top scorers Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving due to injuries
The game marked the Mavericks' first win in five games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks hadn't lost six consecutive games since Jan. 23-Feb. 1, 2021
The game was the latest in a series between the two teams
